rules_text:
Vigilance
{T}, Return an artifact you own to your hand: Put an artifact card artifact card with mana value equal to 1 plus the returned artifact’s mana value from your hand onto the battlefield.

og_1:
This creature’s power is equal to the greatest mana value among artifacts or equipped creatures you control.
